stories.title: How to Conduct a Developer Performance Review

stories.text:
Hey everyone, I'm the program director at TinySeed, a year-long remote accelerator specializing in SaaS startups. Our applications are now open for our Fall 2021 batch: https://tinyseed.com/latest/applications-open

Our program is designed to help founders with a revenue-generating SaaS optimize product-market fit and grow faster. Full program details: https://tinyseed.com/program

Our Fall 2021 batch will be our fourth batch. We've already seen great results from folks who went through our earlier years: - The 13 companies in our 2020 batch grew by an average of 413% during the accelerator year. â€” The company with the lowest starting MRR in that batch wound up with the highest percentage growth (1170%!) by the end of the program. - Our 2020 batch also included our first acquisition (congrats to SeekWell!)

TinySeed is a part of MicroConf and was founded by Rob Walling (Drip, Startups for the Rest of Us) and Einar Vollset (Discretion Capital, YC09 alum).

Send us an email at hello@tinyseed.com if you have any questions, or leave a comment here. Hope to see you apply!
